reviews.review_text: A small local restaurant with great service, food, and overall experience! Definitely a go-to place for veg thali when you are in Valpoi! Huge variety of thalis to choose from & side dishes are delicious as well.

Please dont but anything parcels from this restorunt this is my personal experience which I faced 2 times from this restorunt.
1 ) I buy 2 plate of chicken fried rice parcel and at home I found there was no single piece of chicken in it only egg was there.
2) I buy 50 rupees of fish curry parcel and It was of one night before .

In valpoi there are many restorunt aditya, big bite , sateri and many more where you get fresh food please visit there so such scam dosent happen with you.

Earlier it was serving very good Chicken Chinese dishes so had took parcel last week and was very disappointed ðŸ˜ž had to throw entire Chicken crispy and garlic Chicken in dust bin after tasting it..
